description: An Isle of Man scheme aims to help domestic abuse victims "regain ownership of their lives".
title: Manx domestic abuse project receives funding boost
title_page: Manx domestic abuse project receives funding boost - BBC News
maintext: Chair of the Manx Lottery Trust, Sarah Kelly said it had been "upsetting to hear about the rise in domestic violence" during lockdown and the trust was keen to help get the course "on its feet".
